JavaScript runtime on Fiber

faster, lighter, better

Quick start  github >  gitee >

$ curl -s http://fibjs.org/download/installer.sh | sh

rapid development

  • Rich built-in modules, ready to use after installation
  • Develop high-performance web services in no time without understanding asynchrony

Excellent performance

  • High-performance built-in web server
  • All C++ implementation of kernel components
  • Built-in multi-core support

community friendly

  • Fully open source
  • Compatible with npm module management
